example_en: The metro is the fastest way to get around Tbilisi.
example_ka: მეტრო თბილისში გადაადგილების ყველაზე სწრაფი საშუალებაა.

example_en: Buy a ticket before you get on the bus.
You need to transfer at the next station.
The bus was full of passengers.
The bus driver was very friendly.
Which bus route goes to the university?
Get off at the next station.

example_ka: ზოგიერთ ქალაქში ჯერ კიდევ არის ტრამვაი.

example_en: Let's take a taxi, it's faster.

example_en: The local train stops at every station.

example_en: The help desk is on the ground floor.
